content.prompt: If a viral infection significantly reduces the size of the snowshoe hare population, which of the following predicts the most likely effect on the community during that year?

choices.label: The biomass of producers will decrease.
The biomass of the lynx will increase.
New predators will feed on the owls.
The lynx and owl populations will decrease.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
